content: When the second stage begins, he'll fly up in the air and a giant axe will appear. This will swing and eventually crash down but can be dodged quite easily. The attack doesn't end here, however, as Erlang quickly follows up with his own attack to try and catch you off guard. This will send out a ripple that looks like ice, that you'll need to roll over or jump to avoid.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Chapter_3_Secret-Mount_Mei_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 3 Secret - Mount Mei Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Mei-Jian Peak' and the sub-subsection 'Erlang, The Sacred Divinity'.
The content is as follows:
When the second stage begins, he'll fly up in the air and a giant axe will appear. This will swing and eventually crash down but can be dodged quite easily. The attack doesn't end here, however, as Erlang quickly follows up with his own attack to try and catch you off guard. This will send out a ripple that looks like ice, that you'll need to roll over or jump to avoid.
